trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging"></xref>, <xref href="System.Data.DataTable.RowChanged"></xref>, <xref href="System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleting"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleted"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Data.DataTable.RowChanged"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleting"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleted"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataRowChangeEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 DataRowChangeEventHandler 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 每當事件發生時，直到您移除委派，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
